title: Two to Foxtrot
description: A Unity-based game where I served as the main programmer, responsible for gameplay mechanics and optimizing player experience.

title: Little Match Girl MR Experience
description: An MR experience on Meta Quest 3 along with live actors interaction design in passthrough mode.

title: Breathe Deep
description: A submission for the Global Game Jam Pittsburgh, won Jammer's Award.

title: Minijava Compiler
description: Developed a compiler for MiniJava, implementing lexical analysis, syntax parsing, semantic checks, and code generation.

title: Python Pacman Pathfinding AI
description: Implemented AI algorithms for pathfinding and decision-making in a Pacman environment.
